name: gloria tote bag
sizes_available: one size - bag measures 11" wide, 3" deep, and 15" high
notes:
*meet the gloria tote bag – your new favorite crochet project!* 

the gloria tote bag is pure crochet joy—fun to make and even more fun to carry everywhere. plush yarn and a beautiful, irresistible stitch pattern come together to create a bag that’s both stylish and satisfying. fair warning: once you finish one, your friends (or even the whole group chat) might start dropping hints for their very own!

*[view this pattern for free on my blog!][1]*

**materials**

* 480 yards worsted weight yarn in 3 colors. sample uses lion brand re-make in chestnut, hazelnut, and azure blue
* 5mm crochet hook
* scissors
* locking stitch markers
* tape measure
* tapestry needle
* steam blocking supplies (garment steamer, blocking mats, rust-proof t-pins)

**techniques**

* basic crochet stitches
* interlocking block stitch
* working in turned rounds
* creating a bag handle
* steam blocking technique

**measurements**

bag measures 11" wide, 3" deep, and 15" high
